messages.message:
Hi team,
This is a noob question. What is the crafting-aihub sandbox (https://crafting-aihub.test.instabase.com/) used for? AFAIK, crafting-cyp is used for running pre-merge cypress tests but I am not sure what crafting-aihub is used for.
Context: Deployments to this sandbox have been consistently failing for several days and I want to understand the impact of these failures before suggesting we kill it :slightly_smiling_face:
I know it’s used as the backend for the `frontend` crafting template (cc @Weiming Wu) but besides that idk. I’m down to remove it if we’re moving away from the frontend template anyways
It’s technically broken if crafting-aihub isn’t in a good state

Thanks, William. What would it take to kill it?
Deployment failures are just posted to <#CCY413CSU|> without tagging any oncall. So if no one is looking into the failures, these posts just end up being spam.
@Serena and @Paul H have a lot more context on the environment so there might be something I’m missing

@Weiming Wu can you move your development onto a crafting sandbox using the `ibdev-backend` template?

if only one engineer is using the `frontend` template, i don't think it makes sense to continue maintaining the `frontend` template and the crafting-aihub environment

If we’re destroying the `crafting-aihub` cluster, we should give people a heads up to migrate any files/projects over to a new env.

I’m pretty sure we don’t have anything but it’ll be good to do a callout

Yea I'm not going to advocate for keeping it around just for me lol
I already have a sandbox running on ibdev-backend so you can clean it up at any time.
